    11.2.0

    Better Vendor Price 

    Version: v1.22.0
    by: MooreaTv [More]

    Better Vendor Price WoW Classic and BfA



    Shows per individual, current stack and full stack prices.
    (ie also shows the sell price per unit)

    Works anywhere including bags, vendors, item links in chat and the Auction House.

    Can now also optionally show "Auction House DataBase (AHDB)" pricing info

    Why is it useful ?

    Sometimes the regular vendor price isn't enough to decide what to keep and what to discard:

    For instance imagine you have 4 something that sell for 12s and 2 of something else for for 8s and both are dropping right now

    Well assuming they both stack in 5 max, you should get rid of the 4 as you can get 20s from that slot with the other item (vs 15s for the other)

    But if one stacks in 20 and the other in 5 or 10, the calculation changes !

    Unless you are a math wiz and can do all that in your head (and if you know the stacking size), you can use this addon to guide you! (and if a math wiz, it'll tell you the stacking size too)

    Other info

    Works for both BfA and WoW Classic (where it's even more useful given lack of default vendor price)

    Get the binary release using curse/twitch client or on wowinterface

    The source of the addon resides on https://github.com/mooreatv/BetterVendorPrice

    Releases detail/changes are on https://github.com/mooreatv/BetterVendorPrice/releases

    Better Vendor Price
    v1.22.0 (2025-08-06)
    Full Changelog Previous Releases
    • Switching packager; Changes for MoP and Retail 11.2.0 - report any issue

    Would it be at all possible to have BVP highlight the least valuable item in the players BAGS?

    When you're out questing your bags are bound to get full and there isn't always a vendor around to sell off items to make room, with this when your bags get full in the middle of nowhere you can see at a glance which item/s are best to destroy to make room.

    Done in v1.10 !



    Tell me what you think (/bvp config to turn it on)

    Originally Posted by Koudelka
    Originally Posted by Sant90JH
    Originally Posted by MooreaTv
    I can add an option but basically it is the current way because it's hard to self document modifiers (ie people would not know the feature exists)

    Can you elaborate on why 2 more lines in the tooltip is a big deal?
    It's not a big deal, no worries. I just thought an interface option to select a modifier to use on tooltip hover like some of the auction addons I've used in the past would be just what I wanted.

    I like how clean it looks without extra info is all. I mean, I'm the type of person that is bothered by addons that print they loaded when I log in (so really, don't mind me). I usually disable those messages etc, but, looking at the .lua just got me lost so I thought i'd mention it. So I toggle this addon on and off in-game when i'm low on bag space in a new area with junk I'm unfamiliar with. It's great info, thanks again.
    I second this, I'm using this addon, and I wouldnt mind being able to do this. Perhaps make it a toggleable option using slash commands.

    When I install a new addon, i usually explore it's options to see if theres any tweaks I can do or if it makes sense to do.
    Last edited by MooreaTv : 10-14-19 at 08:17 PM.

    Re: Re: Re: option to detect cheapest item
    Originally Posted by bsmorgan
    Originally Posted by V1X0
    +1

    The ctrl click red highlight cheapest item in bag, for cleaning bags up, would be very nice to have!
    +1 from me as well! At the low level Classic toons are at now, bag space is at a premium and this feature in the "other" addon is keeping me from replacing it with this one.
    Which one though ?

    Let's say you're in some zone and your bags are full and something drop... and maybe you have a partial stack that _right now_ is worth less than some other item but if the item is dropping will be worth more... which one do you want to highlight? it depends on what happens next/if it's (still) dropping

    That's why this addon so far doesn't try to make decisions for you but instead present you with the info to make such decision

    But if there is an idea on how to solve ^ I'd be happy to do it

    MooreaTv
    An Aku'mai Servant

    Forum posts: 38
    File comments: 20
    Uploads: 8
    Originally Posted by b3n9ti
    Originally Posted by MooreaTv
    ...
    hey there! would it maybe be possible to change the order of the lines in the tooltip? so that what you would currently get for selling the stack you have to the vendor is the most downward thing and not in the middle? ;-)
    So the current order is from lowest (unit price) to highest (full stack price), with the idea that if you're still grinding you will probably reach that full stack price - and if your bags are full you may use that last price as the one to decide which bag slot to destroy

    Also note that I don't suppress the actual vendor price when you open the vendor (which then will be the first price listed)

    All this being said I can possibly add an option to change the order, if you still feel strongly about it ?
     
    MooreaTv
